Row.Text: Corporations provide an alternate way for your civilization to amass a fortune in [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Corporations are incorporated by building a Corporation World Wonder. Incorporating a Corporation allows every civilization to build franchises of that Corporation. Starting with the Mass Media technology, Corporations start automatically spreading their franchises to other civilizations. One of the benefits of owning a Corporation is that its franchises will never automatically spread to your own cities -- you are in control of your own corporate destiny![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every turn a Corporation will exert a certain amount of pressure against eligible cities. Once enough pressure has accumulated, a fan of the Corporation will be created in that city. Once the number of fans reaches 1/2 the population of the city or greater, the franchise will successfully spread and be created in the city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Many factors can have a positive or negative impact on Corporation franchise spread:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Buildings[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Diplomacy[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Technologies[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Leader Traits[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Religious Beliefs[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Ideology Policies
